pageContent: Background: Patients with advanced prostate cancer eventually cease to respond to hormonal therapy and thus progress to hormone refractory prostate cancer (HRPC). Prednisone has been used in this setting; however, limited data is available for this monotherapy in the asymptomatic HRPC population.

Couples surviving prostate cancer: challenges in their lives and relationships
